data.name: English_CreateWallet_Message
data.value: Please fill in the following fields to create a new wallet

data.name: English_Error_A100
data.value: Wallet File does not exist at specified location *path*. This wallet will now close.
data.comment: Error_A100 refers to the cleint not being able to locate the wallet file at the location specified when imported/created. Culprit: The user has moved or deleted the wallet file while it was in use.

data.name: English_Error_A100_Lock
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Error_A100 occured when the user tried to lock the wallet.

data.name: English_Error_A100_Pass
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Error_A100 occured when the user tried to change the wallet password

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Incomplete_Message
data.value: All password fields are required. Please try again.
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when one or more fields are empty.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Incomplete_Title
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when one or more fields are empty.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Incorrect_Message
data.value: The current password entered was incorrect. Please try again.
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the current password is incorrect.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Incorrect_Title
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the current password is incorrect.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Insufficient_Message
data.value: New password needs to be at least 4 characters. Please try again.
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the new password entered is too weak.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Insufficient_Title
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the new password entered is too weak.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Invalid_Message
data.value: The current wallet password entered is incorrect and the confirmation password did not match the new password. Please try again.
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the current password is incorrect and the new password and confirmation password don't match.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Invalid_Title
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the current password is incorrect and the new password and confirmation password don't match.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Match_Message
data.value: The new password cannot match the current password. Please try again.
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the new password matched the current wallet password.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Match_Title
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the new password matched the current wallet password.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Success_Message
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the user entered the current wallet password and the new password and confirmation password match. In other words, the wallet password has been changed successfully.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Success_Title
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the user entered the current wallet password and the new password and confirmation password match. In other words, the wallet password has been changed successfully.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Unequal_Message
data.value: The new password and confirmation password do not match. Please try again.
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the new password and confirmation password don't match.

data.name: English_ManageWallet_Dialog_Unequal_Title
data.comment: Used in ManageWalletView. Dialog Box appears when the new password and confirmation password don't match.

data.name: English_PromptPassword_DialogMessage
data.value: The wallet '*name*' will not be loaded.
data.comment: Used in PromptPasswordView. Dialog Box appears when user clicks Cancel.

data.name: English_PromptPassword_DialogTitle
data.comment: Used in PromptPasswordView. Dialog Box appears when user clicks Cancel.

data.name: English_PromptPassword_IncorrectMessage
data.value: Incorrect password. Please try again. Please enter the password associated with the wallet '*name*'
data.comment: Used in PromptPasswordView. TextBlock: Message The user entered an incorrect password, so original message (English_PromptPassword_Message) is replaced with this one.

data.name: English_PromptPassword_Message
data.value: Please enter the password associated with the wallet '*name*'

data.name: English_RecoverWallet_Header
data.value: You are attempting to recover the wallet '*name*'
data.comment: Used in RecoverWalletView. Label: LblHeader Note the *name* in the Value section. That is replaced during runtime

data.name: English_RecoverWallet_Message
data.value: Enter the Recovery Phrase associated with the wallet in the text box below.

data.name: English_RecoverWallet_Note
data.value: Make sure to leave a space after each word

data.name: English_RecoveryPhrase_Intro
data.value: The following bold text of words is your newly created wallet's 'Recovery Phrase'. The Recovery Phrase is used to recover your wallet when you forget/misplace your password.

data.name: English_RecoveryPhrase_Outro
data.value: This is the only time you will have access to the Recovery Phrase so store it somewhere safe and away from prying eyes. This phrase is the only alternative to recover a wallet who's password is forgotton/lost.

data.name: English_SetPassword_Message
data.value: Now that you have recovered your wallet, give it a new password.

data.name: English_Welcome_IntroMessage
data.value: Thank you for downloading Jet Wallet. Jet Wallet is a Bitcoin Wallet that you can use to send and receive Bitcoin securely. You will find that this wallet software is quite defensive for good reason.

data.name: English_Welcome_OutroMessage
data.value: Remember to use a strong password when creating a wallet. If you forget your wallet password, you can recover your wallet using the 'Recovery Phrase' uniqely generated for each wallet created.

data.name: English_Welcome_QuoteMessage
data.value: One of the major motivations of Bitcoin was to give people the ability to control and personally manage their own funds. This software was built to support that motivation. It is also open source.
